author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Heidelbergcement AG Says To Sell Stake In Lehigh White Cement Company In The USA‍​
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - HeidelbergCement AG:
* SAYS TO SELL STAKE IN LEHIGH WHITE CEMENT COMPANY IN THE USA‍​
* SAYS THE ENTERPRISE VALUE OF THE TRANSACTION AMOUNTS TO ABOUT USD 140 MILLION
* SAYS DISPOSAL IS PART OF OUR GLOBAL PORTFOLIO REVIEW * CLOSING OF THE TRANSACTION IS SUBJECT TO CUSTOMARY CONDITIONS AND IS EXPECTED DURING THE FIRST QUARTER 2018
* 51 PERCENT STAKE BEING SOLD TO THE MINORITY SHAREHOLDERS AALBORG CEMENT COMPANY, INC. AND CEMEX, INC Further company coverage:
